name: Analemma
description: Discover a new, mysterious and unusual world. Pass the tests, open the secrets of the main character and slightly open the veil of secrecy, as well as find the answer to the question - "Who am I? And why am I here? ".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space
